title: Code.org CSP AP survey (2020-2021)
description: We are trying to learn more about why Code.org CS Principles students do or do not take the AP CSP exam. We will use this information to improve our support for CS Principles students and teachers. Thank you in advance for filling out the survey - it should take no more than 5-10 minutes of your time.

elements.name: students_took_exam
elements.title: Did any of your students take the AP CSP exam (or a portion of the exam) this school year (2020-2021)?

elements.name: exam_mandatory
elements.title: For your students this year (2020-2021), was the AP CSP exam...

choices.text: Mandatory for all of your students?
Highly recommended for all of your students?
Optional for all of your students?
Recommended for some of your students and not for others?
Not recommended for any of your students?

elements.name: took_multiple_choice
elements.title: What percentage of your students took the **multiple choice** portion of the AP CSP exam?

choices.text: About a third of my students (20-40%)
Only a few of my students (<20%)

elements.name: took_create_task
elements.title: What percentage of your students took the **Create Task** portion of the AP CSP exam?

choices.text: About a third of my students (20-40%)
Only a few of my students (<20%)

elements.name: who_decides_mandatory
elements.title: Who decides whether or not the AP CSP exam is mandatory for your students?

choices.text: A district administrator or other district official
Me / the teacher of the class

elements.name: factors_students_took_exam
elements.title: For the students in your class who took the exam, how important do you think the following factors were to their decision?

rows.text: They felt well-prepared to take the exam
They wanted college credit
They wanted an AP class on their college application
I or another educator encouraged them to take the exam
Their parent(s) / guardian(s) encouraged them to take the exam
The exam fee was waived or paid for by the school / another group
They intend to pursue computer science after high school
Their friends also took the exam
Other (please specify below)

elements.name: other_factors_took_exam
elements.title: What other factor(s) contributed to your students' decision to take the exam?

elements.name: how_teacher_encourage
elements.title: What (if anything) do you do today to encourage your students to take the AP CSP exam? How effective is it in getting students to take the exam?

elements.name: factors_why_not_take_exam
elements.title: For the students in your class that did NOT take the exam, how important do you think the following factors were to their decision?

rows.text: They were not academically prepared to take the exam
They did not feel confident enough to take the exam
They were worried not passing the exam might hurt their college prospects
It was optional
They do not intend to attend college
They do not intend to pursue computer science after high school
I (or another educator) advised them not to take the exam
Their parent(s) / guardian(s) advised them not to take the exam
Their friends were not taking the exam
Having to pay the exam fee
The pandemic affected their decision
Other (please describe)

elements.name: other_factors_not_take
elements.title: What other factor(s) contributed to your students' decision to NOT take the exam?

elements.name: why_discourage_students
elements.title: What circumstances or factors cause you to encourage or discourage your students from taking the AP CSP exam?

elements.name: additional_ideas
elements.title: What additional ideas do you have for increasing the number of students that take the AP CSP exam? This could be something you could do or something someone else (the school, Code.org, the college board, parents, etc.) could do.

elements.name: why_exam_not_offered
elements.title: What are the reasons for the AP exam *not* being offered or recommended to your students this year?

elements.name: changes_needed
elements.title: What would need to change to enable your students to take the AP CSP exam? How could Code.org help?

elements.name: any_other_comments
elements.title: Is there anything else youâ€™d like to tell us about the AP CSP exam and your CS Principles classroom?
